original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
analyzed: avassutāya bhikkhuniyāḥ avassutassa purisa puggalassa kāya sasaggam sādiyantiyāḥ āpattiyaḥ channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti

original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti—
analyzed: avassutāya bhikkhuniyāḥ avassutassa purisa puggalassa kāya sasaggam sādiyantiyāḥ āpattiyaḥ channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti

original: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato …pe….
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhanti na vācataḥ pe

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
analyzed: dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyāḥ āpattiyaḥ channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti—
analyzed: dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyāḥ āpattiyaḥ channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti

original: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ samuṭṭhanti na vācataḥ na cittataḥ

original: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca samuṭṭhanti na cittataḥ

original: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhanti na vācataḥ

original: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhanti
